name: docker-express-mongo
description: An Express Docker container linked to a mongodb container.

scripts.docker:restart: yarn run docker:stop && yarn docker:rm && yarn docker:run
scripts.docker:run: yarn run docker:mongo && yarn run docker:dev
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop exp-mongo-app && docker stop exp-mongo-db
scripts.docker:start: docker start exp-mongo-db && docker start exp-mongo-app
scripts.docker:rm: docker rm exp-mongo-app && docker rm exp-mongo-db
